actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill concerning legal counsel for recipients of loans under programs administered by the Department of Agriculture.

summary.text: Provides that in any case in which a loan for real property is made under any program administered by the Secretary of Agriculture, a lawyer admitted to practice in the State where the property is located and regularly engaged in practice in that State may deal with the Secretary in any matter with respect to the loan as legal counsel for the recipient.

titles.title: A bill concerning legal counsel for recipients of loans under programs administered by the Department of Agriculture.
